docs.text:
DBReportPDF




Is a 
Xojo/(Real Basic)
 component for create PDF files.
Based on pdfFile by Toby W. Rush and 
roblthegreat/rsfpdf
.


v0.2.2817 by Bernardo Monsalve.


Requirements


You can use in projects since RealStudio 2011r4 to Xojo 2016r4, desktop and console apps.


Installation


Add Component/* files to your project.


Use


Open 
DBReportPDF Example.rbvcp
 for RealStudio or 
DBReportPDF Example.xojo_binary_project
 for xojo.


See the Button PDF Action event for create PDF file.


Some util commands:




Dim pdf As New DBReportPDF
 - Create a new object with default paper size (letter).


pdf.Author, pdf.Title, pdf.Subject, pdf.Keywords
 - Define properties.


pdf.DrawString, pdf.DrawLine, pdf.DrawRect, pdf.DrawOval, pdf.DrawPicture
 - Draw someting.


pdf.NextPage
 - Create a new page.


pdf.Save
 - Save the pdf on a FolderItem.




Configuration


The file 
DBReportShared
 has a 
kzlibPath
 constant. That contains the location of zlib shared library for compression.


The ZLIB1.DLL file is for Windows SO, in macOS or linux you 
need
 install the 32bit version 
(except Xojo 64bit) or disable compression with 
pdf.Compression= False
.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Is a  Xojo/(Real Basic)  component for create PDF files.
Based on pdfFile by Toby W. Rush and  roblthegreat/rsfpdf .  v0.2.2817 by Bernardo Monsalve.
docs.title: DBReportPDF

docs.text: You can use in projects since RealStudio 2011r4 to Xojo 2016r4, desktop and console apps.
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: Add Component/* files to your project.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Open  DBReportPDF Example.rbvcp  for RealStudio or  DBReportPDF Example.xojo_binary_project  for xojo.  See the Button PDF Action event for create PDF file.  Some util commands:   Dim pdf As New DBReportPDF  - Create a new object with default paper size (letter).  pdf.Author, pdf.Title, pdf.Subject, pdf.Keywords  - Define properties.  pdf.DrawString, pdf.DrawLine, pdf.DrawRect, pdf.DrawOval, pdf.DrawPicture  - Draw someting.  pdf.NextPage  - Create a new page.  pdf.Save  - Save the pdf on a FolderItem.
docs.title: Use

docs.text:
The file  DBReportShared  has a  kzlibPath  constant. That contains the location of zlib shared library for compression.  The ZLIB1.DLL file is for Windows SO, in macOS or linux you  need  install the 32bit version 
(except Xojo 64bit) or disable compression with  pdf.Compression= False .
docs.title: Configuration

docs.text:
Release notes


0.2.2817


- Fixed console issues.


0.2.1614


- Fixed ReadShort, ReadLong; Deprecated on Xojo 2015r2.


0.2.1515


* Add AddFontFolder.
- Fixed some messages on Adobe reader.
- Fixed fonts true type on windows objs.


0.2.1510


* Add DrawTextAreaAsImage.
- Fixed some DrawTextArea issues.


0.2.1504


* Add GetCurrentBaseLine.
- Fixed some DrawTextArea issues.


0.2.1427


- Fixed EURO and other characters.
- Fixed multiline text problem.


0.2.1404


* Add support for image resolutions


0.2.0204


* Initial release
docs.title: Release Notes

docs.text:
0.2.2817  - Fixed console issues.  0.2.1614  - Fixed ReadShort, ReadLong; Deprecated on Xojo 2015r2.  0.2.1515  * Add AddFontFolder.
- Fixed some messages on Adobe reader.
- Fixed fonts true type on windows objs.  0.2.1510  * Add DrawTextAreaAsImage.
- Fixed some DrawTextArea issues.  0.2.1504  * Add GetCurrentBaseLine.
- Fixed some DrawTextArea issues.  0.2.1427  - Fixed EURO and other characters.
- Fixed multiline text problem.  0.2.1404  * Add support for image resolutions  0.2.0204  * Initial release
docs.title: Release notes
